Headline: Orange, Green and Pink Line Delays; Normal Routing has Resumed
ShortDescription: Orange, Green and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick passenger at Adams/Wabash. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange, Green and Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick passenger at Adams/Wabash. Service is resuming.  Allow extra time.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Revised: #95 95th & #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: #95 95th & 112 Vincennes/111th buses rerouted WB: 95th, State, 87th, Halsted & 95th; EB 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette & 95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #95 95th & #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 95th/Wentworth.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted & 95th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette & 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ridgeland/South
ShortDescription: Northbound 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via South Blvd, Scoville, Lake and Ridgeland: due to, street blockage near Ridgeland/South.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via South Blvd, Scoville, Lake and Ridgeland: due to, street blockage near Ridgeland/South.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #108 Halsted/95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 108 Halsted/95th buses rerouted SB: 95th, State, 87th, Halsted & 95th; NB 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette & 95th: due to, street blockage near 95th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#108 Halsted/95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near, due to street blockage near 95th/Wentworth.

Southbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted & 95th.

Northbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette & 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
